Topic.Title: New Game Called " Into The Shadows"

Posts.EditableText:
http://textadventures.co.uk/games/view/hsgxqsmtrksxwh8vyuerxg/into-the-shadows .

Genre : Mystery , Adult

Enter The life of several detectives who are caught in unusual case which brings danger to their doorstep. 
Be Advised, This game does consist of decisions and strong language, but this is just an Introduction to the story so there will more options and decisions in upcoming episodes.
